alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 24 at 12:28AM MDT until June 24 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT EARLY THIS MORNING FOR SOUTHEASTERN MEADE AND NORTHEASTERN PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 1228 AM MDT, Local law enforcement reported flooding in the warned area. The rain has ended. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, county roads, and highways as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Union Center, Elm Springs, Hereford, Curlew Lake and Viewfield. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
